mapper.update:
update examnationItem
dId = #{dId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eIName = #{eIName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
elSpecification = #{elSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eIFee = #{eIFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
elFeeType = #{elFeeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
elCode = #{elCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where eIId = #{eIId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select eIId, dId, eIName, elSpecification, eIFee, elFeeType, elCode from examnationItem limit #{begin}, #{pageSize}
select eIId, dId, eIName, elSpecification, eIFee, elFeeType, elCode from examnationItem
